entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff who is in hiding with Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who sent Ron Weasley the Firebolt and is in hiding from dementors.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley received the Firebolt from Harry Potter.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as being present in the scene where Ron receives the owl.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is a cat who took an order to the Owl Office for Harry Potter.

entities.name: owl office
entities.description: The Owl Office is where Crookshanks took an order for Harry Potter.

entities.name: hagwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school that Harry Potter attends and wants to allow Muggles to glimpse him near.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are non-magical people who will be allowed to glimpse Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Buckbeak are in hiding together.
Harry Potter sent the Firebolt to Ron Weasley.
Hermione Granger was present when Ron received the owl.
Crookshanks took an order to the Owl Office for Harry Potter.
Harry Potter wants to allow Muggles to glimpse him near Hogwarts.
